entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 15 February 2023
